titles.title: MP436 Lord make me a mountain

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, make me a mountain
standing tall for You,
strong and free and holy
in everything I do.
Lord, make me a river of water
pure and sweet,
Lord, make me a servant
of everyone I meet.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lord, make me a candle
shining with Your light,
steadfastly unflickering,
standing for the right.
Lord, make me fire
burning strong for you,
Lord, make me be humble
in everything I do.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Lord, make me a mountain
standing tall for You,
Lord, make me a fountain of water
clear and new,
Lord make me a shepherd
that I may feed Your sheep,
Lord, make me a servant
of everyone I meet.
